name: Stick & Sneak - GMTK 2021
description:
A game for the GMTK game jam 2021

Stick and sneak is a stealth game where you stick to everything you touch! Can you evade the guards and pull off the perfect heist, even if you accidentally steal a few extra objects on the way?

The more objects you stick to, the easier it is to be spotted, but your score will be higher! Can you get the crown in every level?

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

WASD for movement

that's it really

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
